Class Reservation

java.lang.Object
Reservation
public class Reservation extends Object
Represents a reservation for a room.

  • Constructor Details

    • Reservation

      public Reservation(String guestName, int checkin, int checkout, Room room)
      Constructs a reservation without discount code.
      Parameters:
      guestName - the name of the guest
      checkin - the check-in day (0-30)
      checkout - the check-out day (0-30)
      room - the room associated with the reservation

    • Reservation

      public Reservation(String guestName, int checkin, int checkout, Room room, String discountCode)
      Constructs a reservation with a discount code.
      Parameters:
      guestName - the name of the guest
      checkin - the check-in day (0-30)
      checkout - the check-out day (0-30)
      room - the room associated with the reservation
      discountCode - the discount code used in the reservation
